text: Ðis synd ða landgemæran to oddungga lea.
Ærest of stigelec on<../images/tbar.gif>riþig ondlong riðies<../images/tbar.gif>on þane grenan weg ondlong weges on þa mearc<../images/tbar.gif>swa to feower gemæran<../images/tbar.gif>swa eastrihte.
Ondlong weges on þa dic of þam dice on deor leage þæt swa on longan dic ondlong dices on eardlæge þæt swa be þam rahhege on calwan hyll.
Þonne suðrihte on crohhæma gemæra ondlong þæs gemæres eft on stigelac.

Ða landgemæru æt þære healfre hide æt lawern ærest of lawern on<../images/tbar.gif>riþig ondlond riþiges on<../images/tbar.gif>graf swa be þam græfe utweardon þæt hit cymð to þæm hæþe swa forð be þam æcerhege<../images/tbar.gif>on suliggraf swa be þam grafe on þa portstræt ondlong stræte þæt hit cymð to þam grenan wege.
Ondlong þæs weges on haran læh swa eastrihte be þære gebura londe<../images/tbar.gif>on fearnleage of þære leage on þæt mor þurh þone onippan burnan ondlong burnan eft on lawern.
Ðonne is ealles þæs landes þe Osuuold bisceop bocað Cyneþegne þrinde healf hid & VI æceras æt haranlea & XL æcera be æastan lawern.
And se haga be suðan byrig se is XII gerda lang and VIIII gerda brand.
On þa gerad wyrce<../images/tbar.gif>he wyrce<../images/tbar.gif><../images/tbar.gif>land seo unforworht into þære halgan stowe.
